name: protein_projector
title: Protein Projector
summary: Runs Protein Projector from Cell Mapping Toolkit

inputSpec.name: input_embeddings
inputSpec.label: Input embedding files
inputSpec.help: TSV files containing input embeddings. Should include 2 or more files.

outputSpec.name: proteinprojector_results_tar
outputSpec.label: Results
outputSpec.help: Gzipped tarball of of results. The embedding is located in coembedding_emd.tsv for more information on format outputs refer to: https://cellmaps-coembedding.readthedocs.io/en/latest/outputs.html
